headline: Design Professional

experiences.title: Manager
experiences.description: Led cross-functional teams on client-facing design initiatives. Managed project timelines, deliverables, and stakeholder communication. Applied design thinking to business and strategy problems.

experiences.title: Analyst
experiences.description: Conducted market and product analysis to support decision-making. Collaborated with design and engineering teams. Produced reports and insights for senior leadership.

raw_text_excerpt:
Minh Pham 
 
Design Professional
 Beijing, China Hong Kong 
 
 Professional Experience 
 Manager, BCG 2022 – Present 
 • Led cross-functional teams on client-facing design initiatives. 
• Managed project timelines, deliverables, and stakeholder communication.
 • Applied design thinking to business and strategy problems. 
 
 Analyst, Tencent 2013 – 2017 
• Conducted market and product analysis to support decision-making.
 • Collaborated with design and engineering teams. 
 
 • Produced reports and insights for senior leadership. 
Education
 BSc in Design 2011 
 
 The University of Hong Kong 
Skills
 • UI/UX Design 
 
• Prototyping
 • Graphic Design
